bio: I'm a cybersecurity enthusiast specialized in web application penetration testing and self-taught developer.

certificates.title: Endpoint Security
certificates.description: The Endpoint Security course introduces the architecture, structure, functions, components, and models of the Internet and other computer networks.

certificates.description: The Cybersecurity Awareness course provides an overview of the cybersecurity landscape and introduces key concepts.

certificates.description: The Introduction to Cybersecurity course develops foundational understanding of cybersecurity and how it relates to information and network security.

certificates.description: The Introduction to Packet Tracer course introduces the architecture, structure, functions, components, and models of the Internet and other computer networks.

certificates.description: The EF SET is the world’s most convenient and affordable English test. It’s the standardized test that you can use to prove your English level.

certificates.description: The Introduction to Networks course introduces the architecture, structure, functions, components, and models of the Internet and other computer networks.

certificates.description: The Cybersecurity Essentials course develops foundational understanding of cybersecurity and how it relates to information and network security.

courses.title: Certified in Cybersecurity
courses.description: The Certified in Cybersecurity course provides an overview of the principles and practices of cybersecurity, enabling students to understand how to identify and mitigate cyber threats.

courses.title: Advent of Cyber
courses.description: Advent of Cyber is an event aimed at helping people learn the basics of cybersecurity through a series of challenges.

courses.title: Fundamentos de Ethical Hacking
courses.description: A training course in ethical hacking that covers the basic concepts of cybersecurity, including vulnerabilities, attacks, defenses, and security techniques. The course provides an overview of the principles and practices of ethical hacking, enabling students to understand how to identify and mitigate cyber threats.

institution.name: Instituto Federal de Educação, Ciência e Tecnologia do Paraná

metadata.description: Hello, friend. I'm sim0wn, a developer and ethical hacker specialized in web application vulnerability assessment.

salutation: Hello, friend. I'm sim0wn, an ethical hacker.

quote.message: All the intellectuals that come to mind write, not because they have to or get paid to, but simply for its own sake. What good is thinking if you can’t share?
quote.author: Aaron Swartz
